attributes.action: When Tony "The Spice Girls New Britain" Blair resigns, disolve the present government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please, let the democratic populus of The United Kingdon of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (I believe this is how we are known now!!) Decide the next prime minister, By allowing us all a general election. Thank you.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
